column1: Moreover, the JMO, giving evidence at the trial, refuted the contention that one of the
marks found across the neck of the deceased was a mark caused while the deceased
was alive.
(cid:541): ඔබ(cid:433)මා සඳහ(cid:486) කළා අංක 10 (cid:433)වාලය ස(cid:572)බ(cid:486)ධෙය(cid:486)?
(cid:541): එය කවර ආකාරෙය(cid:486) ඇ(cid:431) (cid:618)ය හැ(cid:251) (cid:433)වාලය(cid:250)ද?
උ:  ෙමය  ෙබ(cid:610)ල  මැද  හරස්  අතට  (cid:536)(cid:655)ටලා  (cid:431)(cid:556)ණා.  න(cid:575)(cid:430)  ෙම(cid:655)  එෙලස  (cid:336)ව(cid:430)ව
තැ(cid:666)(cid:572) (cid:433)වාල ද(cid:250)නට ලැ(cid:556)ෙ(cid:412) නැහැ. ඒ (cid:487)සා මට ෙමම ල(cid:253)ණ (cid:336)ව(cid:430)ව ඉ(cid:486)න
අවස්ථාෙ(cid:617)(cid:463) ෙමම තැනැ(cid:430)(cid:431)ය (cid:336)ව(cid:430)ව (cid:646)(cid:377)න අවස්ථාවක ෙය(cid:464) බලය(cid:250) ෙහ්(cid:433)
ෙකාට ෙගන ඇ(cid:431) (cid:621) ල(cid:253)ණ(cid:250) ෙලස සඳහ(cid:486) කර(cid:486)න බැහැ.
Further, the JMO confirmed the possibility of the above-mentioned mark being caused
by the wire found at the place of the incident and marked as a production in Court.
Therefore, it is submitted that the wound no.10 found on the body (15cm horizontal
mark across the front middle of the neck) of the deceased supports the proposition
that  the  Appellant  attempted  to  hang  the  body  using  the  wire  subsequent  to  the
commission of murder in order to stage it as a case of suicide. In addition, the JMO
giving  evidence  confirmed  that  there  was  evidence  of  a  struggle,  evidence  of  the
deceased’s mouth being covered shut, and evidence of a blow to the head.
(cid:541)(cid:431)ෙර(cid:676)ධය  පෑෙ(cid:572)  බලය  අ(cid:397)(cid:592).  එන(cid:575)(cid:430)  ඇය  දගලා  ඇ(cid:431)  බවට  ල(cid:253)(cid:415)  ෙයාදා
බා(cid:657)ෙ(cid:617) ෙනරා ඇ(cid:431) වැල (cid:573)ට, දණ(cid:655)ස, වළ(cid:613) කර ආ(cid:635)තව. එවැ(cid:487) අවස්ථාවක ඇය
ය(cid:572)(cid:251)(cid:646) ආකාරෙය(cid:486) දැග(cid:612)ම(cid:250) කර ඇ(cid:431) බව(cid:250) පැහැ(cid:462)(cid:611)ව ෙ(cid:535)නවා. එෙම(cid:486)ම අංක
2 සහ 3 (cid:433)වාල (cid:575)ඛය ආ(cid:635)තව ඇ(cid:431) තැ(cid:610)ම(cid:250). එය (cid:575)ඛය වැ(cid:647)මට පා(cid:618)(cid:316)(cid:317) කලා. ඊට
අමතරව අංක 1 (cid:433)වාලය (cid:655)සට ය(cid:572)(cid:251)(cid:646) (cid:618)(cid:462)හ(cid:251)(cid:486) පහර(cid:250) වැ(cid:464)(cid:415) (cid:433)වාලය(cid:250).
SC APPEAL 16/2020                   JUDGEMENT                                    Page 10 of 15
